SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.audit

Class Saml2IdpAuditListener

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events.AbstractSaml2IdpEventListener
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.audit.Saml2IdpAuditListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApplicationListener<ApplicationEvent>
public class Saml2IdpAuditListener extends AbstractSaml2IdpEventListener
An event listener that handles the events publishes by the SAML IdP, translates them to audit events and publishes them.
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m

    • onSuccessResponseEvent

      protected void onSuccessResponseEvent(@Nonnull Saml2SuccessResponseEvent event)

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

    • onPostUserAuthenticationEvent

      protected void onPostUserAuthenticationEvent(@Nonnull Saml2PostUserAuthenticationEvent event)
      The user has been successfully authenticated, but the SAML assertion has not yet been created. Publishes an audit event containing Saml2UserAuthenticationInfoAuditData.
      Overrides:
      onPostUserAuthenticationEvent in class AbstractSaml2IdpEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - the event

    • onUnrecoverableErrorEvent

      protected void onUnrecoverableErrorEvent(@Nonnull Saml2UnrecoverableErrorEvent event)

      Overrides:
      onUnrecoverableErrorEvent in class AbstractSaml2IdpEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - the event

    • onFailedCredentialTestEvent

      protected void onFailedCredentialTestEvent(@Nonnull FailedCredentialTestEvent event)
      The credential monitoring reports that a credential test has failed. A successful or failed credential reload event will follow.
      Overrides:
      onFailedCredentialTestEvent in class AbstractSaml2IdpEventListener
      Parameters:
